rules.title: Failure to comply with the rules of use of the platform will lead to account blocking and removal of ads
rules.1: Prohibited materials: Please do not post offensive, obscene, or illegal content.
rules.2: Accuracy and reliability: Only publish accurate information in your classifieds.
rules.3: Advertising and spam: Posting unsolicited commercial messages, advertisements, or spam is prohibited.
rules.4: Responsibility for your own content: Users are solely responsible for what they publish.
rules.5: The obligation to provide real data: When creating an account, you must provide true and accurate information about yourself. Accounts with fake information may be blocked. Your privacy is important to us and the data will be used in accordance with the privacy policy.

about.title: Information
about.text: On this page you can view data and events related to the selected dormitory
